Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_DIGITAL_STATUS

The basic type MILES_DIGITAL_STATUS describes the current state of the digital audio.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 SMP_DONE Sample has finished playing, or has never been started. (Debugger value: 2).
 SMP_PLAYING Sample is currently playing (active). (Debugger value: 4).
 SMP_STOPPED Sample has been stopped/paused. (Debugger value: 8).
 SMP_FREE Sample has been freed back to the system. (Debugger value: 1).
 SMP_PLAYINGBUTRELEASED (Windows and MacOS only) Sample is currently playing (active), but the hardware digital handle was released by a call to AIL_digital_handle_release. When the digital handle is reacquired, the sample will begin playing again. (Debugger value: 16).


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_sample_status, AIL_active_sample_count, AIL_allocate_sample_handle, AIL_digital_handle_release, AIL_end_3D_sample, AIL_end_sample, AIL_init_sample, AIL_sample_status, AIL_stop_3D_sample, AIL_stop_sample, AIL_stream_status
Related FAQs: When can I free the memory I gave to MSS?
